ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Oracle Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: I once watched a lvl 50 Wizard Gate in, pull the Oracle around the hill and burn him dead with one Ice comet. Guardian never budged. Shannyn t Daisemi ...
ygData.messageBody:
I once watched a lvl 50 Wizard Gate in, pull the Oracle around the hill and burn him dead with one Ice comet. Guardian never budged.

Shannyn t'Daisemi



>>> "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...> 03/08/00 06:46PM >>>
From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>

a high level druid and wiz can take him out easy, have the druid harmony the
guardian, nuke the oracle, then the wiz jumps in... little to no risk


----- Original Message -----
From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2000 8:10 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Oracle Robe


> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Mon, 6 Mar 2000 15:32:45 -0500
> From: "Michael Calhoun" <ninxf@...>
> Subject: Re: re: Oracle Robe
>
> >It was on the Prexus Server. I was pretty pissed since I was planning to
> >get one soon. I figured that it was becoming too easy for higher lvls to
> >get. Maybe now it will be part of a quest.
>
> Kodros Cicero
>
> Hmmm...I'm not sure about it getting "easy". =) I never actually fought
for
> mine myself...didn't want to mess with my faction. I ended up buying it
for
> the going rate on Veeshan, which was about 1000pp.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
>
